DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Radiation therapy use high-energy x-ray kill tumor cell . Giving intraoperative radiation therapy may reduce amount normal tissue need remove . PURPOSE : This phase II trial study well give radiation therapy surgery work treat old woman stage I breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Radiation Therapy During Surgery Treating Older Women With Stage I Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Study feasibility reproducibility intraoperative radiotherapy treatment lumpectomy old woman stage I breast cancer . Secondary - Study impact regimen maintain self-care . - Study quality life ( QLQ-C30 ) satisfaction care . - Study regimen tolerance cosmetic result . - Evaluate economic impact treatment . - Study relapse-free disease-specific survival . OUTLINE : Patients undergo conservative breast surgery axillary node dissection ( sentinel node classic resection ) . At point , patient must either negative axillary lymph node removal ≥ 6 lymph node , negative sentinel node , limited lumpectomy negative margin ≥ 2 mm . Patients undergo intraoperative radiotherapy surgery , close reconstruction breast . Patients may begin hormonal therapy complete study therapy . After completion study therapy , patient follow every 3 month 1 year , every 4 month 1 year , every 6 month 3 year .
